title:
Solving FDE-IVPs by using Fractional HBVMs: some experiments with the
  fhbvm code
abstract:
In this paper we report a few numerical tests by using a slight extension of
the Matlab code fhbvm in [8], implementing Fractional HBVMs, a recently
introduced class of numerical methods for solving Initial Value Problems of
Fractional Differential Equations (FDE-IVPs). The reported experiments are
aimed to give evidence of its effectiveness.
